summary: TeumessianBot Launches New Features for DeFi Traders - TeumessianBot is a pioneering crypto bot on Telegram that combines self-custody and AI support to simplify DeFi duties. It offers cutting-edge tools and services such as mirror trading, limit orders, NFT aggregation, and token bridging. The bot aims to support all types of DeFi traders and provides a user-friendly interface. TeumessianBot also has plans to expand to other platforms and offers revenue sharing for token holders. It features a self-custody smart contract wallet and various functionalities like swap, virtual debit cards, token scanning, and more.
